Subskills.name: Fortified Bastion
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by honed defenses.

Subskills.name: Lucky Defense
Subskills.description: Chance to increase the amount of stacks gained when struck.

Subskills.name: Sky Bulwark
Subskills.description: Giant bulwarks fall down from the sky on hit dealing increased area of effect damage inflicting elemental break.

Subskills.name: Engulfing Wave
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of honed defenses.

Subskills.name: Thorn Surge
Subskills.description: Increases damage return per stack of honed defenses.

Subskills.name: Deadly Resistance
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by honed defenses based on your armor.

Subskills.name: Hold
Subskills.description: Increases the duration of honed defenses.

Subskills.name: Optimized Safeguard
Subskills.description: Increases the maximum amount of stacks for honed defenses.

Subskills.name: Unstoppable Goliath
Subskills.description: Honed defenses no longer causes ground slam at maximum stacks increasing your maximum life, damage return and life replenish for each stack.

Subskills.name: Weakening Counter
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict armor break when struck.

Subskills.name: Oppresive Countermeasure
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash a ground slam on the attacker when struck dealing damage based on honed defenses stacks.

Subskills.name: Deflective Fortification
Subskills.description: Gain increased damage return per stack of honed defenses decreasing its damage dealt.

Subskills.name: Hauling Surge
Subskills.description: Pull monsters towards you dealing increased damage and stunning them when reaching maximum stacks of honed defenses.

Subskills.name: Risen Guards
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of maximum stacks. At maximum stacks honed defenses calls forth a legion of skeleton warriors fighting on your side for a short duration.
